parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the vehicle to become difficult or impossible to steer, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning indicator illuminates
the steering wheel is unable to be turned
the vehicle loses power steering functionality without warning
the steering seizes without warning
the vehicle requires great difficulty to steer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A corroded torque sensor can cause the power steering system to fail, leading to a loss of steering assist and increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning indicator illuminates
the steering wheel is unable to be turned
the vehicle loses power steering functionality without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate repair of the power steering system during recall repairs can lead to continued power steering failure, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning indicator illuminates
the steering wheel is unable to be turned
the vehicle loses power steering functionality without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the steering rack and pinion can cause the power steering system to fail, leading to a loss of steering assist and increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering warning indicator illuminates
the steering wheel is unable to be turned
the vehicle loses power steering functionality without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the internal component of the front suspension strut can lead to a safety issue, potentially causing loss of control or accidents, especially if not addressed promptly.
symptoms: Unusual noise in the front suspension
potentially accompanied by a change in vehicle handling or ride quality.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear shock absorbers can lead to a loss of vehicle control, potentially causing accidents, and can also result in expensive repairs.
symptoms: None reported prior to failure
but may include changes in vehicle handling or ride quality.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Seat Sensors and Unexpected Airbag Deployment
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of seat sensors can lead to unexpected airbag deployment, which can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities. Additionally, the deployment of airbags and seat belt pretension systems can result in costly repairs and leave the vehicle inoperable.
symptoms: The service airbag warning light is illuminated
unexpected deployment of driver and passenger side-impact airbags
unexpected deployment of seat belt pretension systems.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to unexpected airbag deployment, which can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities. Additionally, the failure to deploy airbags in the event of a crash can result in increased risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: Unexpected deployment of airbags
failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash
service airbag warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt cable assembly can cause the seat belt to separate during a crash, leading to increased risk of injury or death.
symptoms: The seat belt cable assembly shows signs of wear and fatigue
the seat belt cable assembly is abraded against the trim
the seat belt cable assembly is cut or damaged
the seat belt tensioner cable is worn or damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of a permanent fix for the seat belt cable assembly recall can leave vehicle owners without a safe and reliable solution, potentially putting them at risk of injury or death.
symptoms: The temporary fix is not deemed safe enough
the vehicle cannot be sold or traded in due to the open recall
the manufacturer does not have a permanent fix available.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The current recall only addresses the outside steel cable, leaving the inside seatbelt clip vulnerable to the same issue, which can cause the seat belt to fail during a crash, leading to increased risk of injury or death.
symptoms: The inside seatbelt clip is also damaged due to abrasions and rubbing against the trim
the sleeve is cut or damaged
the cable is exposed and rubbing against the trim.
